title: Modern Karawang West Java Hotel with Restaurant & Spa
description:
Experience the charm of Indonesia's West Java at this modern stay in Karawang. This hotel is perfectly positioned for exploring the city's vibrant markets and developments, including the nearby Karawang business district and major industrial estates.

Dine on authentic Indonesian cuisine at the hotel's onsite restaurant, Nuance restaurant with both buffet or a la carte options, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the stylish Cup & Cakes bar by the pool. The hotel also boasts a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a tranquil spa, perfect for rejuvenation. For golf enthusiasts, the renowned International Golf Club is just a short drive away.
offer_address: Jl. Interchange Karawang Barat, Margakaya, Teluk Jambe Barat, Karawang, Jawa Barat 41361, Indonesia
